question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Legacy Park Paver Repair Project, Outdoor Warning Sirens - Design Project, Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2 Project.
evidence_answer: Outdoor Warning Sirens - Design (FEMA Project), Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs (CalJPIA/FEMA Project)
extracted_search_list: Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2 Project

Project Description: This project consisted of replacing the damaged guardrails throughout

Kanan Dume Road.

guardrails. The project was completed in February 2021.
